description: Returns the status of the sync with the Git repository for a specific Amazon Web Services resource.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services resource for the sync status with the Git repository.

parameters.name: SyncType
parameters.description: The sync type for the sync status with the Git repository.

nested_items.name: DesiredState
nested_items.description: The desired state of the Amazon Web Services resource for the sync status with the Git repository.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The branch name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: Directory
nested_items.description: The directory, if any, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for a specific revision, such as the GitHub owner ID for a GitHub repository.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The provider type for a revision, such as GitHub.

nested_items.name: Sha
nested_items.description: The SHA, such as the commit ID, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: LatestSuccessfulSync
nested_items.description: The latest successful sync for the sync status with the Git repository.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: The events related to a resource sync attempt.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The event for a resource sync event.

nested_items.name: ExternalId
nested_items.description: The ID for a resource sync event.

nested_items.name: Time
nested_items.description: The time that a resource sync event occurred.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of resource sync event.

nested_items.name: InitialRevision
nested_items.description: The current state of the resource as defined in the resource's config-file in the linked repository.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The branch name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: Directory
nested_items.description: The directory, if any, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for a specific revision, such as the GitHub owner ID for a GitHub repository.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The provider type for a revision, such as GitHub.

nested_items.name: Sha
nested_items.description: The SHA, such as the commit ID, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The start time for a resource sync attempt.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status for a resource sync attempt. The follow are valid statuses:
SYNC-INITIATED - A resource sync attempt has been created and will begin soon.
SYNCING - Syncing has started and work is being done to reconcile state.
SYNCED - Syncing has completed successfully.
SYNC_FAILED - A resource sync attempt has failed.

nested_items.name: TargetRevision
nested_items.description: The desired state of the resource as defined in the resource's config-file in the linked repository. Git sync attempts to update the resource to this state.

nested_items.name: Branch
nested_items.description: The branch name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: Directory
nested_items.description: The directory, if any, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for a specific revision, such as the GitHub owner ID for a GitHub repository.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The provider type for a revision, such as GitHub.

nested_items.name: Sha
nested_items.description: The SHA, such as the commit ID, for a specific revision.

nested_items.name: Target
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services resource that is attempted to be synchronized.

nested_items.name: LatestSync
nested_items.description: The latest sync for the sync status with the Git repository, whether successful or not.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: The events related to a resource sync attempt.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The event for a resource sync event.

nested_items.name: ExternalId
nested_items.description: The ID for a resource sync event.

nested_items.name: Time
nested_items.description: The time that a resource sync event occurred.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of resource sync event.

nested_items.name: Status

SYNC-INITIATED - A resource sync attempt has been created and will begin soon.
SYNCING - Syncing has started and work is being done to reconcile state.
SYNCED - Syncing has completed successfully.
SYNC_FAILED - A resource sync attempt has failed.
